amendment.description: Amendment sought to reallocate $1 million to create an Office of Good Jobs for the House of Representatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House Report 114-611 to reprogram funds to create an Office of Good Jobs for the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 241 (Roll no. 289).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 241 (Roll no. 289).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Ellison.
